display.title: Tag - You're It!
description: The &&3ME Tag Storage Bus&&r is crucial to send tagged items to a desired destination. It does what it says in the tin - simply set its filter by clicking on it, then any items that enter your AE2 network that &&ematch the programmed Item Tag&&r will be sent to the inventory attached to the Bus.
This can be particularly useful in the event that you wish to use a &&afiltered subnet&&r to process ore.
Remember to set a &&5high priority&&r if you want to prioritise Ore Processing!
